description: Shell-specific hooks: shellcheck, set -euo pipefail check

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  # Run shellcheck if available
  if command -v shellcheck >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    issues=$(shellcheck -f gcc "$file_path" 2>/dev/null | head -10 || true)
    if [ -n "$issues" ]; then
      echo "[Hook] Shellcheck issues in $file_path:" >&2
      echo "$issues" >&2
    fi
  fi
  
  # Check for set -euo pipefail
  if ! grep -q 'set -e' "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "[Hook] Missing 'set -euo pipefail' in $file_path" >&2
    echo "[Hook] Add at the top of the script for safety" >&2
  fi
  
  # Check for unquoted variables
  unquoted=$(grep -nE '\$[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*[^"'\'']' "$file_path" 2>/dev/null | grep -v '\$(' | head -3 || true)
  if [ -n "$unquoted" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] Potentially unquoted variables:" >&2
    echo "$unquoted" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Shellcheck validation, check for set -euo pipefail and quoted variables
